channel.title: distribution on Dominic Royé
channel.description: Recent content in distribution on Dominic Royé

item.title: River flow directions
item.description: I recently created a visualization of the distribution of river flow directions and also of coastal orientations. Following its publication in social networks (here), I was asked to make a post about how I did it. Well, here we go to start with an example of rivers, coastal orientation is somewhat more complex. I did the same for a selection of European rivers here in this tweet. However, originally I started with the orientation of the European coasts.

item.title: Geography
item.description:
Videos 3d model of Nazaré Canyon off the coast of #Nazare, Portugal. Well known as hotspot for big wave surfing.
Graphics River flow directions were estimated using vectorial data. River flow directions were estimated using vectorial data. Orientations of coast segements were estimated using vectorial data with a resolución of 9 vertices to 1 km. Orientations of coast segements were estimated using vectorial data with a resolución of 9 vertices to 1 km.
